Package io.openems.edge.common.statemachine

This package holds helper classes to define a State-Machine inside an OpenEMS Component.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    State<STATE extends State<STATE>>
    Defines a State of a AbstractStateMachine.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractStateMachine<STATE extends State<STATE>,CONTEXT>
    Manages the States of the StateMachine.
    StateHandler<STATE extends State<STATE>,CONTEXT>
    Defines a Handler for a State of a AbstractStateMachine.

Package io.openems.edge.common.statemachine Description

This package holds helper classes to define a State-Machine inside an OpenEMS Component. Finite State-Machines are a good, reliable and well-tested way of handling the logic inside an OpenEMS Controller or inside OpenEMS Device implementations. This package consists of three classes:
  • StateMachine manages the different States
  • State is typically implemented by an enum that represents the different States
  • StateHandler holds the actual code of a State
